1.content:
The year is 2315.Anthromorphs and magical beings are a common result in the world.In 2053,a man named Mana Khan took over the world.He was benevolent and kind.7 emperors later,Kagen Khan took the throne.He declared furries and several species freaks.He exiled them to a many places,the worst one called the "Desert of Sin."This place is a one way trip to Hell.
You were just an average citizen.Everyone was equal,even furries.When Kagen came to power,he took away rights from "'The freaks' and exiled them.One day,the Sin Soldiers(Kagen's military and police force)
broke into your house and took you to a camp.You were taken by a hover transport to the desert and shoved off onto the ground in midair.It flew away.All prisoners who were exiled were forced to wear a mask,hiding there identity.Only a special key or extreme strength could break it off.You wandered the desert for hours until you finally passed out.
Several figures came and saw you lying there passed out.One,obviously the leader,lightly kicked you onto your side so he could get a look."It's barely alive.Let's take it with us,I can hear a storm approaching."
You wake up several hours later in a foot deep pool.Your face is lying on a small walkway going across it.It connects a main room.A 2 feet wide stream runs through it,dividing a part with a crude elevator and a small part with a throne on it.The throne has it's back to you.You cough to get some water out of your mouth.
"Ah.I see your up!"a voice says.The chair turns around,revealing the person in it as a sitting 11 foot tall dragon.You find out he's a boy by looking someplace you wish you hadn't"You are pretty damn lucky we found you.Another few minutes,and you would've been swallowed by the desert storms."
"Who are you?"you ask.
"I am Draco,king of Exilopolis!"Draco said."Because the the city saved you,you owe it your life.We will use it well."
"That doesn't sound like a good deal to me."You say.
"You are not in a position to make decisions like that my friend!"Draco said half-menacingly."Now,before you may even begin repaying your debts,you must answer a few questions.First of which,are you male or female?I didn't want to pull your mask off or find out the other way."he said with a chuckle."If I removed your mask,I might have taken your face with it.And I don't like other methods."
1.title: How it Began...

11.content:
"I am a male."you say
"Good.I like having a fellow man around."said Draco writing something down on some tablet he had."Next question,what species are you?"
11.title: What's your species?

choices: regular food  (like you're gonna pick this one)
111.content:
"I'm an Artic Wolf" you say.
"Oh.." said Draco. "we don't get many wolves out here...especially Artic ones. We have a lot of Coyotes. Okay, last question: What kind of food do you like to eat?"
111.title: Artic Wolf

1111.content:
"I like to eat anything that's alive" you say.
"I might've guessed" said Draco. "Now, I know I said that was the last question...but, what's your name?"
"I'm Zyas" you say.
"Hmm...What an interesting name" said Draco.
Another dragon, though not as tall as Draco, enters the room. Draco glances to the other dragon.
"Be with you in a minute, Pryro" said Draco to the other dragon. Pryro gives you a glare before he leaves the room.
"Who's that?" you ask.
"Pryro, my brother" said Draco. "I got to get things done, Z-Man, I'll call someone to show you to your new home" Draco gets up from the chair and exits the room. In the five minutes you're alone in the room, you take off your mask. You also peel off your clothes down to your boxers. It's not freezing in the room, but it's not exactly warm either. Your fur is white as snow and thick. Like your thick fur would be any use in the desert. Your stomach growls. You haven't eaten in...well, you forgot the last time you ate. Life as a anthromorphic wolf wasn't easy while Kagen rules. You do remember you stayed with a human family not long ago and you used to play with the Kids, Alexander and Jeremy. Maybe your memory is hazy because you passed out in the desert.
"Hi there" said a voice behind you. You turn around and see....
1111.title: Zyas Wolf

choices: Anything with a heartbeat and is smaller than me
The bear raises eyebrow, "Wouldn't you like to know!"
113.content:
"I'm a bear."

"A bear! Excellent! Next question; What do you eat?
113.title: A bear

114.content:
"I am an anthromorphic hedgehog."you state.
"I wish you were a dragon,but then again,I wish everyone was.Next question.What's your name?"Draco asked.
114.title: Your name?

1141.content:
"I am Nightstreak."You say.You have black fur.Red streaks run from your quills to a spot on the back of your neck.The tip of your tail is red.A purple crescent pointing up is on your forehead.
"Good."Draco said writing it down,"Last question,do you have any living relatives?"
"Yes,I think I do.My mom,Violetta,was sent to a camp.My dad,Darknite,left when I was 3.And my uncle,Nightlite,I don't know what happened to him."you say
"Ah!So you are an orphan,in a way.But don't lose hope!When I was young,my parents were murdered by Kagen's men.He was secretly killing others even when he was 11.But now,I am king of a developing city!"Draco said."Anyways,you must now leave.Before that,let me remove your mask.Come here!"You did as he ordered.He pulled it off slowly."There you go.Now go explore the city if you like.I must think about how you may repay your debts.Pay the rat on the wheel in the elevator and say bottom floor.It will take you there.When you go outside,try to find a place called Hedgehog Hall.It has ones who are like you.But whatever you do,do not explore the palace.I warn you!"he said tossing you a coin.You headed towards the elevator.There was a small rat on a hamster wheel.You gave the rat the coin and were about to say bottom floor.
"Oh.I almost forgot!Take this."he said tossing you a bronze amulet on a necklace."That amulet says who you are and that you are a resident.However,that does not mean you are a citizen.You will be deprived of many rights until you earn even partial citizenship."
"Thanks."you say.You say bottom floor.The rat spins the wheel and the elevator descends.You arrive at the bottom floor.You step out and see a light at the end of a bright hallway.You also think if you should explore the palace.What do you do?
1141.title: You're Nightstreak!

11411.content:
You head towards the light at the end of the hallway.You reach the end and take a deep breath.You cough soon after.You remember your in a desert,the air is full of sand.You can hear distant laughs at how you breathed the sand in the air.You see these people look battle hardened.Most wear armor and carry daggers,swords,laser pistols and the occasional rifle.Many bear scars and a few have chunks of limbs missing.You see the city is mostly a bunch of one and two story buildings made of clay.There are few paved streets.Most streets are sand put on even level with stones spaced apart on top of it.
You walk down the massive staircase in front of you.When you reach the bottom,you are in a big open square.People are selling things and trading.This must be the market.You walk down a busy street going out of the market.Hundreds of anthromorphs,6 to 10 foot dragons,and others walk down the street.There are restaurants,bars and other places to go to.You decide you need to plan on where to go.
11411.title: The City of Exilopolis

choices: The group at the pool table
114111.content:
You spent an hour looking for Hedgehog Hall.You found it eventually.It was pretty hard to miss with the neon sign that said Hedgehog Hall.You were curious how it got power.You saw that small bunch of wind power plants were on top,making power for it.You went inside.You saw the bar owner was serving drinks.He was a blue hedgehog with black shades.
"Hey Knux!"he said to a red echidna
A red and drunk echidna with turned toward him and said,"Yeah,what?Did I forget to pay again?"he said before almost collapsing.
"You gotta stop drinking so much man!Half my income comes from you.The money's nice,but your killing your brain on the crap,man!"the bar owner said.
"Now,Shonic,crap ish a sholid.Liquor ish a liquid."the red echidna said before collapsing to the floor.Everyone burst out laughing.
"Knuckles,you have really let yourself go.From guardian of the master emerald,to this.What next?"A fox at the pool table said.A black and red hedgehog took the oppurtunity of his distraction and moved the 8 ball next to the whiteball,near a hole.He began humming in an innocent way.Two other hedgehogs,a black one with a red crescent facing up on it's forehead and a white one with a blue downward pointing crescent on it's forehead,sniggered.
"Ok.Now I just got to..Shadow!"the fox yelled at the hedgehog.
"What?The ball was there remember?"he said.The fox sighed annoyingly,and put the balls back where they were.
You wondered who to talk to.The hedgehog at the bar looked familiar,yet the black one with the red crescent looked familiar as well."Which one?"you asked yourself.
114111.title: Hedgehog Hall

1141112.content:
You head up to the bar owner.He's currently giving drinks to a bat and a female hedgehog.He notices you.
"Ah,I see we have someone new!How's it like being Draco's lapdog?"he asked.
"What's that supposed to mean?"you say angrily.
"Woah,chill out,dude!"a green hedgehog with an odd hairstyle and punk style clothes appears."He was just kidding!Relax.Everyone new has to do something to pay their debts off.I'm still working on mine."he said.
"Cause' your a retard and can't get the job right!"someone in the backround said.
"Who said that?!"the green one said before running off.You hear sounds of a fight somewhere else.The bar owner does'nt seem to care.
"You look familiar?Do I know you?"you ask.
"Well,I'm sure you do.I'm Sonic the Hedgehog!"he said before throwing off his jacket and shades,revealing him as Sonic.Your eyes light up suddenly.You suddenly hug him.
"Uncle Sonic!I'm glad your alright!"you said.He shoves you off.
"What the hell are you doing?"Sonic asked.
"Don't you remember me,Sonic?From when I was a baby?"you ask.Sonic thought for a second.
1141112.title: The bar owner...is Sonic!?

11411121.content:
"You do look familiar."Sonic said."Let me see your face again."he says.You show him your face.He thinks."How old are you?"he asked.
"Fifteen",you reply.Sonic's eyes open and he snaps his fingers when he remembers.
"My cousin,Violetta,had a baby 15 years ago!"Sonic said."What's your name?"
"Nightstreak."you say.
Sonic wraps his arms around you and hugs."Nightstreak!It's good to see you!I haven't seen you in so long.Nightlite,Darknite,come here.You'll never guess who just walked in!"Sonic said.The black and white hedgehogs came over.
The black one held a pool stick and came over."Sonic,what is it?I'm in the middle of a..."he drops his poolstick in shock when he sees you.He rushes over and hugs you."Nightstreak,my son,I'm so happy you're alright."he said rubbing his hand through your quills.
"Nice to see you too,Dad."you say hugging him back.
The reunion was soon broken when Draco's voice was heard over the city's intercom system.(The city has lights for certain places,why not an intercom system?)
"Attention,all citizens of Exilopolis.The battle in the Coloseum is about to begin.Head there now if you wish to see the arena's judgement on newcomers.Today's test is on a young hedgehog named Nightstreak.Send him immediately!"
You gulp in fear."Have faith,my son.We'll be cheering for you!"Darknite said before him,Sonic,Nightlite and everyone else left for the arena.
11411121.title: He remembers

114111211.content:
You head towards the Arena.People seem to look at you when you approach it.You see thare is a crude poster of you fighting someone on the walls.Like the palace,a large staircase with 30 steps lies before you.You head up there and enter the 16 foot high door leading inside.
"Ah,Nightsreak,I see you have arrived."Draco's voice said from a curtained door straight ahead in the hall.It had two very vicious looking guards.He stepped out of the doorway."To get to the battleground,take that elevator down to the battlefloor."he said pointing to an elevator."Don't worry,it's free of charge.Oh,and if you live through the first test,a platform will rise.Jump on it and you will be taken back up."he said before retreating back into the doorway and closing the curtains.You felt like following,but the guards got rid of that idea.You headed for the elevator.It took you down someway.When it stopped,you got out and walked across a stone path.It was right over lava!You saw people in their seats 30 feet above you.When you reached the large stone square that the path connected to,the path submerged.You were trapped.
You heard someone's magnified voice come from above.You looked up and saw he was on a balcony with a throne.Someone with a primitive looking microphone standing next to his throne began to speak.
"Welcome,citizens of Exilopolis!Thank you for coming to see the spectacle of blood and death in the arena!Before we may even start a battle,the contestant must prove himself in a test.He must collect 20 orbs of Niteshock energy scattered around the arena before he may move on.Thank you and let the challenge begin!"he said.(screen fades black.)
114111211.title: The Arena

1141112111.content:
You didn't know what Niteshock energy was was.Then you remembered something.When you were a baby,your uncle,Nightlite,let you hold a bright light that was stuck in a bottle.You liked it and remembered him saying something,'You like it little guy?It's called Niteshock.You can keep it.'You pulled something out from a belt you wore.It was the bottle.You kept it.It contained a black mass inside that turned from black to orange,to red,to blue,to white,and then to black again.It gave off warmth.You looked ahead and saw a small mass hovering there.It would fit in the palm of your hand.You went around for minutes collecting them all.It wasn't easy.There were many traps.There was a trap door that almost sent you down into lava,a group of spiked wheels in the middle of the path,gaps over lava you barely made,and lava would sometimes shoot up past the gaps.You collected them all and a platform rose up just above the surface of the lava.You jumped on.It rose all the way up to right next to Draco's balcony.There was a small platform infront of the balcony.Draco told you to jump over.You did.The announcer said excitedly,"The contesatnts have.."Draco glanced at him angrily,"Won the challenge."the announcer said now as if depressed.
"Anybody can do those simple jumps."Draco said,"Let's see how you fare against live competition!"he said tossing you a short gun.You wondered what it did."Prepare the arena for full combat!"Draco said.
1141112111.title: The Orb collecting

11411121111.content:
You were given an hour to rest.You took the elevator down when you were called to fight.You arrived at the bottom and walked along the stone pathway.You saw three others heading towards the stone platform.You arrived at the platform.You saw one was a anthromorphic wolf.Another was a human height dragon.The last was a red vixen.You were worried.All these species ate hedgehogs for lunch.
The announcer's voice soon boomed over the Colloseum."hank you for your patience,citizens of Exilopolis.Now we may see the bloodshed,among other things,"he said with a chuckle,"In the arena!Let the battle begin!"he said.
You saw them all move.You wondered who you should fight.The vixen,the dragon,or the wolf?
11411121111.title: Let the Battle Begin!

114111211111.content:
You run and jump towards the emerald green dragon.You roll into a ball and hit him straight in the face.He falls down.He regains consciousness and tries to slash at you with his claws.The vixen and the wolf are fighting with those spears with large blades at the end.You fight the dragon and he finally hits you in the ribs with his elbow.You fall down and look up facing him.
"Looks like I'm gonna win this one,hedgehog."he says.You see how if you kick him in the gut good enough,it will send him flying towards the lava.You kick quickly at his lower stomach.
114111211111.title: Fighting the Dragon

1141112111111.content:
You kick quickly at his lower belly.You have incredible strength in your legs,you get it from your father.He's sent flying.But in the air,he stops when his wings start flapping.He instantly dives back down and lands on you.His face is right above yours.His arms and legs hold you down.You can't move!
"Now what to do with you?"he says in a teenage voice."I could kill you,but I'm hungry.I also feel an urge."he says with an evil smile."Uh oh!"you think."What's worse?Getting eaten by a dragon or getting raped by one?"you think
1141112111111.title: It didn't work!

11411121111111.content:
"Do you like trips,my friend?"the dragon asks you.
"Sure.Why?"you say.
"Good.Cause' you're gonna take a trip through my digestive tract!"he says.Your eyes widen in horror.
"Do you have to eat me?"you say.
"I'm afraid I have to.But don't worry.I won't bite and it's warm and cozy in there."he says nicely.He opens his mouth and slides your feet in.He licks them with his tongue to get a flavor.You are being tickled by his tongue.He swallows,bringing you in up to the waist.He continues licking,enjoying you.It only makes him want to bring you in more.He swallows more.He's up to your chest and shoulders.
"It does feel kind of nice."You say.
He swallows again,leaving only your head out.He smiles around you,knowing that you like it.He swallows again.Your pulled completely into his moist,hot mouth.His breath isn't that bad.Your waist is already in his throat.He keeps swallowing.Your head is all that's outside his throat.He swallows,and you are pulled in and a bulge travels down his throat.You are forced into a chamber that's hot and somewhat comftorable.
You hear a large belch and he's moving,probably going to fight others.You hear a voice from outside.
"The dragon,Maximillion,has beaten,or more appropriately,eaten his opponent.He may leave the arena!"You feel movement all around you.He must be flying.You decide to go to sleep.You can't do anything else.

Several hours Later....

You awke with a tingly feeling on your skin.You feel movement underneath you.What is going on?
11411121111111.title: Time for a trip!

choices: He wants to be your friend
It didn't feel right eating you
114111211111111.content:
You feel strong movement around you.You see the entrance to his throat open.Your head is forced up into the opening.Strong contractions pull you up.You and some digested food are being pulled up.Your head is in his mouth now.The contractions push you out of his throat and into his mouth.He opens his mouth and you fall out,covered in saliva and partially digested food.
"Why..Why did you throw me up?"you ask him.
He thinks of an answer.
114111211111111.title: Covered in Dragon Vomit!

1141112111111111.content: "Well,I don't know why,"he says,"but when I ate you,when I looked in your eyes,I saw you wouldn't reject someone because of their looks.I just ate you so I would be able to leave the arena.So,I was wondering,would you be my friend?"the dragon asked."You don't have to be if you don't want to.I won't hate you if you say no.I'll understand."he said.
1141112111111111.title: He wants to be your Friend?!?

choices: He takes you to meet some of his friends
11411121111111111.content:
"Yes,dragon,I will be your friend."you say.
"Excellent.My name's Maximillion,Max for short"Max the emerald green dragon said.He held out his hand,waiting for you to shake it.You shook it."What is your name?"Max asked.
"Nightstreak."you say.
"Well,Nightstreak,it's nice to meet you.Would you like me to clean you or would you prefer to take a bath?"Max asked
"What do you mean you'll clean me?"you ask
"Let me show you!"he says.His tongue suddenly comes out and licks you all over,cleaning up the vomit.You can't help but laugh when the tongue touches your ticklish spots.He finishes shortly after.The vomit is all gone,but you're drenched in saliva."So how old are you?"Max asked.
"Fifteen."you replied.
"Really?So am I!"Max said,"It's good to have someone of the same age around.By the way,I want to take you somewhere to meet someone.Do you want to go?"Max asked.
"Sure,why not."you say.Where does he take you?
11411121111111111.title: You will be his Friend

choices: You're cuddled up next to him
114111211111111111.content:
"I'm going to take you somewhere to meet some friends of mine."Max says."And don't worry,I won't let them eat you."
You gulp at the last words.You look at where you're headed.It's the palace!You look skyward and see it's probably 240 feet tall!20 12 ft high floors are inside.On top of the 240 feet is a 30 feet tall lighthouse with a huge flame on top.
"I know, it's massive for 6 ft guys."Max says,"That light on top is known as the Exile's Beacon. It guides lost ones in the desert back to the city.If they can make it past exhaustion,dehydration,monsters,desert raiders and such that is."Max says.
"How does everyone live out here?"you ask
"Well if you look around,you'll notice this city is built on a river delta.The various islands made by the Delta are mostly for the rich.The largest island holds the palace and is the king's private property."Max said.
You look ahead and see a small river with a wooden bridge over it.You see right on the other side is the palace island.Armed guards stand on the bridge.They wear masks and have leather kilts that cover their legs.Besides spiked shoulder armor,they have no protection on their upper body.They carry very vicious looking metal sticks with sharp blades on the end.They notice you coming on the bridge and cross their weapons over eachother,forming an impassible X-shape.
"State your name and business with King Draco!"one guard says demandingly.
"Maximillion Kali, here with a proposition for his lordship,from my father, Shensu Kali." Max says.
The guards part their spears and give you room to go across. "Of course.You may come through. Oh, and Maximillion,good job in the arena." they say.
You soon reach that hallway with the elevators. You and him take a turn into a hallway. You reach a fancy-looking wooden door. Max opens it.There is a 9 foot black dragon that looks like Draco in the room.There's also an 8 foot blue dragon.
"Hi Drake.Hi Xaru(Zaru)!"he says entering the room and sitting at the table.He's short compared to his friends.
"Hello Max."they say.
"Oh,I see you brought a lunch!"the black one said.
"No,he's not my food.This is Nightstreak,and he's a friend of mine."Max says."Nightstreak,this is Drake,"he said pointing to the black one,"Prince of Exilopolis and son of Draco.And this is Xaru,"he said pointing to the blue one."He's the son of a rich landlord."
Your shivering a little in fear.You're afraid of them.Max notices you.
"He's new to exile life."he says.
"Wait a sec!"Xaru says."Isn't that the kid who you ate in the arena!"
"Yeah,he is.I let him out,though.I knew he would be my friend."Max says.He sees your still shivering."Nightstreak,are you ok?Cause' if you're not,I have somewhere nice and warm I can put you til' you calm down."he says smiling,showing his teeth.You think you know where he means.The place you were after the fight.His belly.
You come closer to him.He takes it as a yes."Before you go,say goodbye to Xaru and Drake."he says.
"Goodbye,Drake and Xaru."you say.As soon as you do,Max grabs you and shoves your entire upper body into his mouth.He quickly gulps you down and you make a bulge in his stomach.
"I'll let you out when we're done here,ok Nightstreak.You shouold sleep til' then."he says patting his stomach.You do exactly that,the massage his stomach muscles gives you and the rhythmic beating of his heart lulling you to sleep.You awake several hours later in the dark.Where are you?It's warm where you are.
114111211111111111.title: Max's Buddies

1141112111111111112.content: You look around you.Strangely,every few seconds,the room around you lights up and then goes dark again.You feel around you.It's warm and soft,yet slightly rough.It doesn't feel like a stomach.You hear a small snoring sound.You see that every few seconds,a small flare comes out of his nose and lights up the room around you for a short time.He's sleeping,and he's curled up around you.His body heat mixing with yours explains the warmth.His arms are partially wrapped around you in a hug.You are kept close.You watch as his stomach rises and falls with his breathing.You try to crawl away.His claws suddenly grab you,his pointy fingernails almost piercing your skin.You cancel that idea.He's mumbling something.What could he be dreaming about?
1141112111111111112.title: Right next to Max

11411121111111111121.content:
You decide to stay where you are and listen in.It's actually quite warm next to him.
"Don't worry little,guy.It doesn't hurt.All I'm going to do is eat you.You'll like it in there.It's soft and warm.It feels good to me and you."he says in his sleep.
"Who's he dreaming about?"you think.
11411121111111111121.title: He's Dreaming about a Meal

choices: He eats you in his sleep!
114111211111111111211.content: You hear him more."Now,Nightstreak,don't try to escape.You'll know that it would be a mistake once you're in my belly."Max says in his sleep.You notice his mouth is opening very wide.You can see a good view of his open maw.The amazing thing is he's sleeping and doing this.His arms seem to be moving around you and pulling you up towards his mouth.You can feel his hot breath on you.What happens?
114111211111111111211.title: He Dreams of Eating You

1141112111111111112111.content:
You get the sense of deja vu as you're lifted towards his mouth.He's gonna eat you for the third time!You try to struggle,but you just wear yourself out in his strong grip.Your head is already between his jaws.He closes his mouth slowly on your shoulders.He begins licking you and sucking you like a lolly pop.He sucks more of you in.You eventually take up too much space.He swallows,taking your head into his throat and your waist into his mouth.
You can hear him groaning.He likes your taste obviously.He swallows again,bringing your knees into his mouth.Your in his throat almost up to the waist.You are a little scared,but not nearly as scared as the first two times.It is kind of nice inside your friend's body.You like the warmth and the sound of his heart.The throat also massages you with it's constant pulsing.You hear another 'gulp' sound.Your feet are the only thing outside his mouth.His tongue is licking them.You laugh a little.What can you say,you're ticklish.The pulsing seems to be getting stronger.So is the heartbeat.His heart must be right next to you.The throat is almost crushing you here,yet it still remains gentle.After a few gulps,you feel your face pressing against something strong.It seems to open.You are squeezed through it.You know what's ahead of you.You are entering his stomach.You finally break free with a small plop.You are now inside a dangerous,yet comfortable and warm place.You like it in here.You decide to sleep,as usual.You also hear Max's voice.
"You were good,Nightstreak.I wanna do this again."Max says in his sleep.You are amazed he is sleeping.He's not aware that he just ate you in his dream and real life!

A few hours later....Max wakes up.What happens?
1141112111111111112111.title: He Eats you in His Sleep!

11411121111111111121111.content:
"Ah.Morning."Max says getting up.He notices you're gone."I wonder where Nightstreak is?"
"Look down."your muffled voice says from inside.
Max looks down.He notices his stomach is much larger than it was before."How'd you get in there?!"he asked.
"Isn't the answer obvious."you say.
"You crawled in."he said.
"No.You kinda ate me in your sleep.Do you dream about eating me?"you say.
"Well,I do actually.What can I say,you taste good!"Max says.
"Would you mind spitting me out?"you ask
"I sorta would."Max says."My instincts don't tell me to throw food up.Yet,instinct doesn't know that food can be your friend."
Max starts to throw up.You feel motion beneath you.A few minutes later,you're on the ground covered in vomit.That's what sucks about being thrown up.Max uses his tongue to clean you.When he's done,he tells you something.
"We should go find your family.They're probably sad.They think you're digested food."Max says.
You nod and walk with him to Hedgehog Hall.You think about going in normally.You also think of playing a sick,yet funny joke on your family.What do you do.
11411121111111111121111.title: Heading to the Hall

114111211111111111211111.content:
You whisper something in Max's ear.You're telling him of playing a joke on your family.He thinks it's a good one.He gives you a bladespear from the arena and you go inside.You see Darknite inside drinking.He looks depressed and sleep deprived.
"Sho,Knucklesh,you shtill think you can drink more than me?"he says drunkingly before taking a sip.A just as bad looking knuckles comes up from below the table.
"No way,Darknite,that'sh the what wash it?Twentyfifth one?"Knuckles says before collapsing back under the table.
Sonic is serving drinks at the bar counter.Sonic looks a little sad but not nearly as bad.He looks at you entering the bar.His eyes shoot open in surprise. "Night...Nightstreak!You..you're alive!"he says running to you and hugging you.He pinches you on the cheek for some reason.
"Ow!"you say.
"You can feel pain!You're not an illusion!"he says.He calls Nightlite and Darknite over.Darknite is happy to see you're alive.
"Nightshtreak,how ish thish possible?I thought you were dragonchow!"Darknite says.He's still drunk.You step closer to the door.You slash the spear through the air as you tell your tale.

After some fighting,Max is now on top of Darknite.His arms and legs pin Darknite down.Max opens his mouth wide.Darknite closes his eyes,not wanting to see what comes next.Max jumps off suddenly,laughing uncontrollably.

114111211111111111211111111.content:
"Hmm... maybe..." Draco murmured.
"I have made my decision, you will have to participate in a special match." Draco said while looking at you.
"A special m-match?" You say as you stand up.
Draco grinned. "Yes, a two versus one fight... and you will be the one alone..."
"How am I supposed to win? Alone?" You say looking right in his eyes. "Hmmf, well it will be a melee fight, so you won't have to worry about being shot at... your secondary weapon will be a dagger, the primary weapon will be your choice..." Draco said while again murmuring something.
"So... can I prepare first?" You say looking at your fur all dirty and covered in vomit.

"Alright, you have until tonight, at 9... if you can find the time around here" Draco said looking around the bar. As you are about to argue, you look at Draco's face, he was angry alright. You decide to move back a few steps as Draco turns around and walks away.

The people in the bar started to talk, and suddenly the noise was a bit too loud for you to handle, as they were saying things as 'He's done for' and 'Poor guy doesn't have a chance!'. Max turned around and looked at you with a sad expression on his face. "D-did I... did I just cause that?" He said stuttering. Sonic walked up behind you placing a hand on your shoulder. "It's going to be O.K." Sonic whispered into your ear. Darknite was sobbing at the bar with another beer in his hand. "Not much support from your father heuh?" Knuckles said, half drunk, not totally aware of what just happened.

You turn around, truly angry. "Do, NEVER speak about my father like that again" You say, a bit loud as everyone suddenly stopped talking, as you walk up to Knuckles grabbing his fur at the chest and pulling him up a bit with the spear in the other hand. Suddenly you feel a hand on your shoulder putting you down. "Listen, save that aggression for tonight will you?" Sonic said as he was holding you down. "We might need knux later on... he's a tough fighter..." Sonic said looking at the still-drunk-partly-shocked Knuckles.

You get up and look into Sonic's eyes. "You realize I am going to die, right?" You say, slowly but aware of what you just said. "No, nightstreak, you won't, trust me." Sonic says grinning. "Knowing Draco, he probably won't make it a two versus... especially not against a new guy. He will play with you first, to see what you really can do... he will probably get the Wolf as he survived his last fight against the Vixen..."
You think for a second and remember what had happened yesterday. You look around the bar, everyone was talking again, not about the fight. Someone is missing. "Where is Max?" You ask Sonic. "Beats me, probably preparing for the fight against you..." Sonic says. "A-a... against me?" You stutter. "Yeah, he caused it, so he's going to pay for it! Friends or no friends..." Sonic says turning his head a bit to the right to look if Darknite was still OK, and not too drunk. Knuckles was at the pool table with the fox... Tails...

"What should I do now?" You ask Sonic. Sonic looked at Knuckles at the pool table. "You should probably take a bath first, then prepare for the fight, practice a bit..." Sonic said. "Maybe later I can introduce you to the people here, but now is certainly not the time..." "Hmmf, can't you help me train? Beating a wall isn't my idea of a training..." You say. "I'll see what I can do, first take a bath, you smell. There's a stairs leading up back there, it goes to my 'Living quarters'." You turn around after you thanked Sonic and walk to the end of the bar. "That guy is soooOOooo toast!" Someone says as you pass by. You ignore him and walk up the stairs.

Your in Sonic's room. For some reason this reminds you of home... sort of, since you never really were home, but at your uncles place... most of the time you would be in the park... anyway. You don't remember having been in Sonic's house before.

1141112111111111112111111111.content:
*/ -_-' I hate it when choices get cut up/*

You walk into the room to your left.
You wonder how they bathe in here, you're in the middle of nowhere, there can't be a bathtub here, unless they made it from wood or whatever...

As you walk into the barely lit room you tumble down a small staircase, laying flat on the floor. You get up again and laugh at yourself. You walk a bit further, and suddenly a light switches on.
'So, the city IS pretty modern' You think, as you look up and see a sensor light hanging above your head, further up you see a small well with water.
It appears to be pretty warm, figures, middle in the desert... should be pretty warm, maybe they warm it up with the sun? Maybe there's like a small fire under it.

You shake your head and slowly get in the water.
It's nice and warm... you try to rub the vomit out of your black fur. It was until now that you noticed you hadn't been wearing any clothes, except for the boots.
Then again, you never wore anything different, almost no hedgehog type did, unless they wanted too.
You let yourself sink to the bottom of the well, it wasn't too deep. You start thinking about things you haven't thought of before. When was the last time you took a real bath?

You recognized some others down in the bar, but who were they? The black and red hedgehog, Shadow. The fox with the two tails... called Tails, the name Miles rings in your ears. The loud mouthed, drunk Echidna, Knuckles who was also 'The previous guardian of the what-now Emerald?' The female hedgehog also seemed a bit familiar, you can't remember the bat though. So many faces, so little time! Why exactly did he notice them instead of others...

Suddendly you notice your still underwater, and swim up. You catch your breath. You notice the light had been switched on above the pool.

You continue thinking. What about the fight tonight? If you really have to fight Max... you don't think you can. Will it be the same arena? Probably, they can't change the decor that fast... unless there is more than one arena...

You seem clean enough, and refreshed. You get out of the water and look at the dirty water. Vomit, vomit and some more vomit. Your boots are gone. You walk outside, up the stairs, you almost tripped over them again. You hear a click as the lights turn off behind you.

Standing in Sonic's room again, for the first time you notice a bed, a look-a-like television, a couch, a table and a small closet. Your boots are next to the closet, they look cleaned. There is also a towel on the table. You reach it and dry yourself.
Your black fur feels as good as new. You take the boots and notice these are new, same size as your old ones. Sonic bought you a present, you smile and go down stairs. You walk up to the bar, some people appear to have left. Sonic greets you. "How do you like 'em?" He asks as he looks at your shoes. "They are perfect, thank you Sonic!" Sonic shakes his head. "Don't thank me, thank Knux, he felt sorry after he knew what he did." You look down at the floor. "I almost hurt him... I'm just a-" "- a nervous chap, protecting his father?" Sonic interrupts. You nod. "You're right Sonic..." You look around. "Where did the rest go? I'm missing half the bar." Sonic looks around, "It isn't as busy as before huh? Knuckles is at the pool table, if you hadn't noticed..." Sonic whispers "... he is sad about what he said, maybe you can go cheer him up." You look behind you and see Knuckles turning his head away quickly. "Man, I don't know half of these people but they all seem so familiar." "Well, I can tell you who is who, introduce them for you if you want to." You shake your head. "Just point them out, I'll introduce myself." "Just like your father huh?" "Did you mean something with that?" "No, no, just that you're both ...stubborn." You laugh. "Yeah, I did get that from my father... didn't I. Where is he by the way?" "He went out to walk, he'll probably be back soon..." You hear your stomach rumble. "Hungry ain't we?" He says, "I can fix you up something, free of charge..."

A black hedgehog, Shadow if you're memory serves, walks up behind you. "I don't remember you giving us any free food around here..." He says, with a low pitch in his voice. "That's because you didn't deserve it yet!" Sonic grins. "Oh come on... still angry about that time huh..." "What time?" You interfere. "Oh, well, there was a time he... kinda tried to uhm... kill me... sorta..." Sonic says, Shadow looks up and whistles. "Well, what happened?" You ask, curious. "Listen kid, now is not the time..." Shadow says looking in your face. Man he looks angry... sorta, as always you suddenly think. "Listen uh, Nightstreak, this is Shadow. Now, sort off a friend of mine." "Sorta? Anyway, nice to meet you Nightstreak." "Have we... ever met before?" You say as you look at his fur, the stripe sort off makes you remember something. "You could say that... " He says as he turns around and walks away to the pool table, where Knuckles is standing. "Uhm anyway, would you like something to eat then?" Sonic says, as your stomach rumbles again. "I don't know, I feel like eating fruit." "Perfectly normal, if you ask me." He says as he turns around and walks out a door, which you hadn't seen before. Some seconds later he comes out with a small dish and a fork. "Don't ask how we got this all, we had to steal it from transports..." Sonic says as he puts it on the bar in-front of you. You start to eat. Apple, some pineapple and a fruit you haven't tasted before. "What is this?" You ask. "The Chinese once called it lychees, or something, it's like a grape but then without the skin, if you know what I mean, it's extremely nutritious and tastes sweet." He says while cleaning a glass and filling it with lemonade. "Don't think your old enough for beer!" He says, laughing softly while pointing his thumb at a sign which says: No beer for the dears. "Thanks for everything Sonic." You eat the last bit of food and drink the lemonade, it tastes sweet. "What time is it anyway?" You ask, looking around to find a clock. "2 pm, you probably expected it to be later huh?" You nod. "Yeah, I thought it was somewhere around 5 o clock!" He turns around. "Shouldn't you thank Knuckles by now?" You get up, building the courage to face Knuckles after what you almost did. You walk toward him, trying to put a smile on your face. Knuckles turns around and hangs on the pool table, he doesn't appear to be drunk. "Uhm, hi... Knuckles wasn't it?" You stand next to him, leaning against the pool table. He doesn't look at you. "Yeah... what do you want?" You look down. "I'm sorry about what I did... I just... well... you know... I-" "You tried to protect your father, and you were probably stressed about the fight tonight..." He turns around and looks at you. "... right?" He says, cocking his head a bit. You smile, then pull a serious face again. "I'm glad you sort of understand... uhm... thanks for the boots, anyway." He looks away again. "No problem..." You don't know how to act now... "I am, sorry ok? It's just that, about what happend..." "Is there an echo in here? Forget it, I did already." He said as he swung one of his hands a bit. "Well bye, nice meeting you anyway..." "Goodbye... Night." You walk back to the bar, sit down and lay your head on the bar. "Didn't work as you expected huh? He's always like that, trying to be the cool guy, sorta..." Sonic says while he cleans a part of the bar. "Anyway, I think it's time to do some training." You get up and he walks around the bar counter. "Watch the bar while I'm gone, Knuckles! And don't drink the beer..." Sonic says as he gives Knuckles the keys to the bar. "Roger wilco" Knuckles says as he salutes. You laugh a bit.

Once outside Sonic looks at you. "So, what you want to do?" He says looking around... the time is 2.42

*/ my story got deleted 4 times cause of the damn board closing on me! No way I'm going to rewrite it over and over!/*

You look around. "I think I need to do something about my speed and agility first. Sonic grins. "I bet you do!" He says as he laughs. "See those pillars over there?" He points to a pair of eleven (11) pillars, 22 in total, perfectly placed next to each other. "Those there? 4 up, 3 same, 4 down?" You say looking into his eyes. "Yup, time to fall for you huh?" He says grinning as he runs over to the pillars. "If I fall I'll break all my bones! the highest ones are at least 9 feet tall if not 10!" You say, converting meters to feet. He looks over his shoulder and grins. It doesn't look that high, the first pillars are about 2 feet... not that you are tall, being a hedgehog.

Some seconds later your both in front of a row of pillars. "Ready to go?" Sonic asks. "You love racing don't you..." You grin as you take a few steps back, Sonic does the same. "Ready... steady... GO!" You sprint forward, up the first low pillar, then make a nice double jump up to the next one, which you land with your knee on. You quickly get up and jump up the next ledge and the next. Not so hard, just jump and you should be half way there. You look to your left, you see sonic already made it to the bow. You quickly sprint over the first bow, jump the gap and make a dive down, completing it with a somersault, landing straight on the second of down, you jump down another one and just as you want to jump down the last one... "I won." ... You slip and fall with your head first into the sand. Sonic laughs.
As you roll over you mumble something about knife and stab. "You did this before didn't you." You ask Sonic. "No no nephew, I didn't..." He smirks. You get up. "REMATCH!" You demand. "Not yet, you ARE pretty agile, not as agile as me... but how is it for speed..." You look around you for landmarks. "How about all the way to the river?" Sonic says. You look around you but don't see a river anywhere, you do know there is a delta nearby, but that's all the way past the city. "You got to be joking me right..." You say as you search for Sonic's mirage. "I meant past the city, you can't see it here..." "I can't run THAT far!" You say about to argue. "You'll have to if you want to survive..." Sonic says. "What's wrong with you, you act way different." Sonic acted a bit, strange. "Oh? Sorry about that, it happens when I want to race..." Sonic says as he 'removes his smirk from his face'.

"Scratch the one on one race, try to keep up with me." sonic says, looking at the sun. "It's somewhere around 3 O clock, 6 hours to go..." He says as he braces himself. "Follow me, ready... s-" "Don't I get a say in this?" you interrupt. "No... GO" Sonic sprints off, you sigh and run after him, as fast as you can. Damn he's fast... the sand forms a fog around you while you try to follow him. You can't see where he is going, so you follow the fog's path. You make a curve left and right. The dust is spreading so that means he is further away than first, he's sprinting, you are still running. You run faster and finally break into a sprint, trying to follow the blue hedgehog. The dust suddenly lifts, as Sonic is way further then you are, you see the dust far in front of you, you are tired. You look over your shoulder to see where the pillars are. They are almost a quarter of a mile away, 400 meters, you calculate in your head. You run that distance really fast, maybe faster than you thought you could. You look in front of you just to see that the dust cloud containing Sonic is even further away then first!

You try to sprint faster, you succeed. You're running on the same tempo as Sonic, but for how long can you hold it? Your feet are moving faster than your eyes can follow! All you see is a forming of a black ball, for your eyes, but you know it are your feet. You decide to sway your arms back and lean a bit forward to speed up. It works, your gaining on Sonic, bit by bit...

30 seconds later you are tired of running, but you still hold the tempo. Sonic looks next to him, just to see you running next to him. His eyes open wide, he probably didn't expect anyone to run as fast as he could. You try to say something, but realize that would cost energy. You run next to him as he tries to shake you off, running in curves. Not so smart, since he just keeps running forward, only making himself slow down. You aren't that stupid... he looks in front of him then his eyes are truly wide open. He stops running trying to stop himself from going too much further. You stop instantly... half instantly, you're still skidding along the sand, making a large dust cloud. You look in front of you, as the dust drifts away, you see why he stopped. You almost ran into...

You actually never thought about age... what about later on, you would be stuck in here... forever...

11411121111111111121111111112111.content:
You look around, to see only a river and the city far behind you. "Hey Sonic..." "Yeah?" "How 'bout right here, right now?" He shrugs "Fine with me."
You crack your neck a bit, moving it in a full circle.

"I don't know if I can do this, I mean, it has been a long time since my last fight..." Sonic says, but gets ready anyway.

You charge at him, acting like a rugby player. You ram your shoulder into his stomach, at least that's what you think you did. He put his hand in front of it and blocked you, you try to push him, but he simply pushes back. Suddenly, he releases you and steps aside, you tumble over and almost fall past the ledge and into the water. "Room for improvement there Night..." "About my name..." You say as you get up, dusting off your fur. "It's NightSTREAK!" You charge at him, your fist flies into his direction. He simply blocks it and holds it. You try to kick him but he simply blocks that.
You try to hit him with your other fist but he simply holds that. "Someone has been training." You grin, he laughs sheepishly. "Yeah, everyone's time comes..."

You twirl his arms so he cant do anything, you hear a small crack and he leans backwards. You jump up and kick him with both your feet, he rolls away as you make a perfect somersault and land on your feet. "Improvement?" You say, with his voice. Sonic, recovering from a roll again stares at you, again amazed. "Where in the world did you learn that?" You grin, a devilish grin. "World?" you say. "I didn't see you fight in the arena like this..." You help him up. "That's because that was just luck." "Thanks for helping me up... Maybe Shadow can train you... he's the 'expert' in those things." You agree. You see something floating your way. "What's that up there?" Sonic turns around. "That? That's Tails... what's he doing out here..." You both sprint toward him, just as your under him he drops from the air. You quickly dive forward and catch him. You help him up. "Are you ok buddy?" Sonic says, letting Tails lean on him.

"I always hated my stamina" Tails says. "I believe we met before..." You say. "Yeah we did. How's it hanging Nightstreak, still thinking about the match tonight?" "Sorta... I ju-" "Why did you come look for us" Sonic buds in. "Oh, right... Darknite came back from his walk... he panted his behind off! He was shocked, he just sat there while everyone asked was going on." Sonic wants to tell you to move but you are already sprinting toward the city.

Coming there you forgot that you don't really know where to go. Suddenly you hear a raw and low voice behind you yell, "there he is!" You see two guys, bigger than a car run to you. You...
11411121111111111121111111112111.title: The fight, the end, the scare...

choices: The plane explodes, with no casualties, just burn wounds
114111211111111111211111111121111.content:
You run to wards them. They suddenly stop. "Wait! that's not him, he has a purple crescent on his face... he's probably somewhere near!" One of them runs away, his partner isn't. "Come on Joe." The large guy, a dragon, looks at you, a strange look on his face. He turns around and walks away. "What happened?..." You hear the other say as he walks back. You look around you. The streets are filled with people. Well, anthromorphs and dragons, but you refer to them as people. You look up, you see a shadow move away.

You walk around the clay building next to you into an alley way, you brace yourself as you jump from the right wall to the left. The alleyway wasn't too narrow, no-one noticed you. You can climb up the clay wall. As you are on top you look around you, you can see a large tower, probably the palace. You see something fly around, something like a huge bird. You suddenly feel a tingle in your spine... or a bat... the bat from the bar, the female, dammit what was her name again... she doesn't notice you, as she glides over rooftops.

The buildings not being very high, you 'drag' yourself down again, past the alleyway, until your on the floor, sand to be precise. You run further, bumping against some people, yelling watch out as you run over the streets. You see the large neon sign again, the one of the hedgehog hall. You run there just to see a bat land on the roof. You kick the door in 'Not literally' and run to the bar. Everyone you knew, and some you didn't were standing around the bar. Around a hedgehog actually, around your dad. You rush up to him just to see him crying. Knuckles was behind the bar, apparently he didn't drink while Sonic was gone.

You 'hug' your dad and ask what is going on. "I... I saw her..." You pull up an eyebrow "Saw who?" You ask. "I think I saw her, Violetta..." "M-mom?!" You stutter. "A-a t-transport vehicle, I saw her face t-through the back window, she saw me... then it suddenly lost control, it... it-it... it crashed, I couldn't save her... I-I tried to..." You have to sit down as everything started to turn, your mom, assumed to be dead, or stuck in camp for life, apparently just died in a crash? You shake your head. "Are you sure it was her, it can't be she was sent to camp!" He shrugs. "When did this happen?" You ask shaking him. "I was... was walking in the desert, I passed the palace, at the north side. I walked... further and-and I saw it hover above me. It tried to land, I saw her and suddenly it just lost control and-and it-it... it just crashed and exploded!" You shake him. "Calm down, WHEN did this happen?" He looks at you, tears in his eyes. "God I don't know, I sprinted back here, then it took some time for you to get here! I think 6 minutes ago!"

Sonic and Tails burst in the door. You pass them and briefly say hi as you walk into the town, some streets away, here and there you find your way too the palace. You quickly pass the side of the palace, sprinting at your top speed. You run and run, until finally you see smoke. You run further... dad spoke the truth... a whole plane like vehicle, burning.

You hear something, you quickly run forward to the vehicle. You hear muffled voices "Help!" A high pitched voice says, followed by a low one. You run up the vehicles side. The fire is holding you back but you sprint right through it, diving and rolling as your fur is burning, just a small burn, it went out.

You see a handle, you touch the handle, there is a lever in the handle. You press it and move it to the side. A door opens and fire comes out. You roll down the side to check for windows, anything to get in.

Then you see her... the salmon colored hair, red-ish fur... You snap out of just admiring her and dive through the apparently not broken window. Glass shards everywhere. She looks at you... suddenly she passes out, you drag her body out of there. The smoke is filling your lungs. You lay her next to the vehicle, away from the fire. "Hello?! Is anyone there? The plane is going to explode! Help us out!" The 'plane' is half filled with sand. You crawl your way to a locked door which is seriously dented. The door is made of soft material, and is easily pushed apart, some sort of metal, as tin or something close. You burst in to hear a loud of coughing and smoke fly past you.

You quickly pull out the 'captain' and the co-pilot of the vehicle. "Is there anyone else in here?" You ask the captain, which is conscious. "No, get out, the plane is going to blow up soon, save yourself!" You drag both the pilot's out of the cockpit and with all your strength you try to pull them out, crawling under the wreck. You help the pilot through the window, you wave him to watch out for the sharp shards of glass. As he and the you try to pull out the co-pilot, you smell a gas... "This place is going to blow! Hurry!" You tell the large man. He looks weird, not a furry or a 'mutant' more like a human... wait... he is a human... the 'almost extinct' human? "You take the woman, she shouldn't be too heavy." He commands you. You carry her, as soon as you take a few steps you hear a large woof like sound behind you, as you want to turn around...
114111211111111111211111111121111.title: The plane...
