choices: You decide to go with the king idea
1141112111111111112111111111211112.content:
You turn around as a sudden flash of light strikes you. You feel your body roll over the sand. An annoying white vision plus a nasty noise in your ear that deafens you. You think you died when suddenly your eyes focus. At first you see a blue rock, the rock gets a mouth that moves, then eyes, then asks if you are ok with the same pitch as Sonic's voice.

You look around you, as your head is on the side you see your mother laying some steps away from you. Tails is trying to wake her up. You see shoes, and black fur. You instantly think it's your dad. He kneels next to you. "Are you ok nightstreak?" He helps you up. Some of your fur was singed and you felt a stinging pain in your side. "You are quite the hero aren't you?" Sonic says. "Dad, I am ok, better check on mom first... I have no idea why I suddenly am the lucky guy to rescue everyone." Shadow is standing some steps away guarding the human. "Look at him... is he really human?" You ask. "I thought most of them were banished to the caves, or at least burned with lava..." Sonic shrugs. "Maybe he cooperated with the dragons?" You shake your head. "I don't think he would betray his own species, maybe the king knows him..." You say. An a bit high pitched voice talks behind you. "Wrong, he was the captain of the ship, he needed to transport people to be allowed, or his brains would probably have been breakfast." Tails, the know-it-all fox, was standing behind you. "The female hedgehog is ok, just passed out from the smoke I suppose. The co-pilot however, which is a wolf, is burned, good thing he had a coat on or his fur would have been a hairy death trap, scorching his skin off as it burned." You look at Sonic, then at Tails. "You know, Tails, don't get me wrong but... your knowledge scares me." You say as you laugh.

"That's a pretty big wound, you sure you don't need anything for it? There IS a hospital in the city you know..." Tails says. You raise your eyebrow. "A hospital... ok... guys... can you explain me: How you get electricity, water, food, medicines and all that stuff?" Sonic shrugs. "All I heard was, that we use nature for electricity, we get water pumped, by the electricity, from the delta close to the city, the food we either get from rebels that bring us food or by stealing it from transports and medicines the same way. Same as all the equipment, weapons and such, but also electrical equipment, such as the light bulbs, television, which are infact pretty rare in the city. If you are lucky you can see a car drive through the town, one of the really old ones, ferraris and such, not the flying cars. The king has connections..." Tails says. For one second your brain hurts but then you get what he said. "Ok, flying cars? Have I been living in the woods all my life?" Sonic laughs. "Actually you did, your, village, wasn't really modern." Sonic says. It's getting dark. "We'd better continue training..." Shadow says as he walks up to you, cracking his knuckles. "Maybe the king will let you alone if you tell what you did!" Tails suddenly says. You think for a second. "Good idea Tails!" Sonic says as he looks at him...
1141112111111111112111111111211112.title: You saved them... why you?

choices: You go to the bar, where you give a massive party
You walk around town, to see if you meet anyone.
11411121111111111121111111112111121.content:
Your mom looks fine with Darknite. You walk up to him. "Take care of mom ok? I have some business to handle." You wave sonic to follow you. "You'd better come with me, you are an eye witness... sort of..." You say. "As long as I don't get in trouble, I'm in."

You, sprint... more like limp because of the burn wound, to the palace, all the way back. First you have to go past some buildings, to the palace, that's the way you came here. "Sonic, lead the way." You say, as he runs faster, takes the lead and you follow him.

(4/5 minutes later)

You arrive at the entrance of the palace. A guard is in front of the door. "I'll do the talking..." Sonic says. "What is your business with king Draco?" The guard asks Sonic. "I have great news of the fellow exile, Nightstreak." He leads on to a large door. You had never seen the entrance doors, never seen it locked either. He knocks on the door, then opens the door slowly, then closes it behind him. "What?" You say as you tried to slip in. "He must first get approval. You hear some muffled noises, but can't really make up what they are. Suddenly the door opens and you step back. "You are allowed to enter."

You follow Sonic inside. Sonic begins to explain... "Wait, let him explain..." Draco says, waving you forward. He leans on the arm of his throne. He looks with the same angry look on his face as before... "King Draco..." "Please, just call me Draco..." You shrug, you would have thought he was still angry. "Ok... Draco... I was training for the match tonight..." "Oh, is this about trying to cancel the match tonight, if so I-" You try to interrupt but Sonic shushes you. "-will call the guard to let you out." "No no, Draco, I was training when suddenly someone ran up to me and told me that my father, Darknite came back from his walk and appeared shocked." "Your father, yes..." Draco was again writing something down. "Draco, king, with all do respect... can I ask you what you are writing down?" You ask. He drops his hand, seemingly insulted. "Well if you really want to know, I'm writing down what you are saying, and what you look like, right now, with those burns... speaking of which, how did you get them?" "Draco, I was getting to that part, sir." "Would you please stop with the formalities?" You shrug again, so does Sonic when you look at him. "As I was saying, I ran all the way to the bar. Dad told me he had seen my mother, Violetta, in a plane just before it crashed! Before you ask, it happened somewhere north of the palace. So I ran all the way there. I risked my life, diving into the plane looking for survivors, my mom was in the side hold, it wasn't a big plane. I dragged her out, then I heard screams for help. I went in further to find a [i]human[/i] pilot and a wolf co-pilot. I saved them all just when the plane exploded. The co-pilot was hurt pretty bad, my mother was ok, the human was also ok and me? Well I just had some burn wounds from the fire I dove through."

Draco thinks for a second. "Was the fire diving part really necessary." You shake your head. "No, I didn't know there was a side window by then. And I almost got fried when flames came out of a compartment which I opened." Draco nods. "So, you are a hero. But what about the human? He can't live here... unless we have to put him under special protection." Draco says, thinking out loud. "Draco, do I get anything special for my efforts?" You say... the time ticks by, as it is almost time for the match to start, you were out cold pretty long, as you look at the clock which points at 5.13

"I suppose I could get the match of you... but maybe not, you trained hard, and the people want entertainment..." He says as he grins. 'Bastard' You think. He must of seen the anger in your eyes. "But I could give you a new amulet so you are truly a civilian of our town, instead of just fresh meat... I mean, new and... not allowed yet." Draco smiles, as he laughs sheepishly.

"How about [i]both[/i]" Sonic buds in. "Excuse me, uhm... Sonic, right? Did I ask you to speak?" He says. "It only seems fair to me..." "Ok that's it, I'm calling my guard..." You raise your fist. "No you aren't." You say. Draco sees the anger in your expression. He relaxes again. "Fine, you won't have to participate in the match, and I increase your level of access..." Sonic cheers. "... But if you ever want to fight in the arena..." He continues but you shake your head. "Thank you so much King." You bow and walk out the room, tapping on the large door which opens.

You run out of the hallway and jump up, hitting the air with your fist. "YES!" You yell. Everyone turns around and some laugh. "Uh, in case you didn't hear it ye-" A large crackle stops you from talking as the intercom is on. "The fight for 9 pm has been canceled. The new fighter, Nightstreak, is a hero, as he saved a female hedgehog and an antromorph wolf from destruction. That was all." Suddenly everyone started to cheer at you. You see the bat fly above you again. You prod Sonic with your elbow. "Who is that?" As you point up. "That? That is Rogue, ex-treasure hunter. She flies around, looking for someone to spy on. She loves doing that..." Sonic chuckles. "My my, Sonic I never heard you laugh like that! The name Rogue does sound familiar... have I ever met her?" "Probably, when she thought there was something to steal at your house." You don't get it. Still you laugh...
11411121111111111121111111112111121.title: Facing the man on the throne

choices: You decide to stay and continue the party
You  decide to go to Max, look if he is ok.
114111211111111111211111111121111211.content:
You come into the bar and you are received with a large cheer. You just stand there, frozen. Waving. Sonic buds you forward. "Take a seat at the bar, I'll get you something special." You do as Sonic say and sit down. Knuckles smiles at you. "So... how did the boots do? Helped you a bit with saving people didn't it?" He pats you on the shoulder, looking proud.

Tails walks with something that looks like an old ghettoblaster. "How did you get that?" You ask Tails. "Uh, well, theres a dump somewhere near. Loads of electrical stuff is dumped there, I rebuild it in my free time. The good thing about this one is, that I programmed some music into it... just in my spare time..." "You said spare time twice." Knuckles says.

Sonic comes out with a large platter. All sorts of fruit and some types are meat on there. You don't really know if you like meat, you never really tried it. So you pick up the fork and dig in. Tails and Knuckles do look a bit hungry. "Uhm, can't you get them something for free?" You say as Tails is somewhat IN your plate. "How do you get money here, anyway..." You ask. "You could work for me if you want to." You nod. "Just give them something, whatever they want... they could use it." You take a bite from the pineapple, tastes nice. Pine apple has always been your favorite fruit. Well, now that you are eating, you might as well take a bite from the hotdog. It tastes nice, actually you kind of like it. You look up and see Sonic snoop a chili dog. "Still eating them?" You say, teasing him. You heard he ate lots of chili dogs. Knuckles, Shadow, Tails... wait... where's... "Where are dad and mum?" Sonic points at the stairs. "They have a private moment together, leave em alone, whatever they are doing up there." Sonic winks. You shiver only of the thought of that. "Anyway, where is Max? I haven't seen him all day..." Sonic shrugs for the zillionth time.

"I was gonna go over to his place... if I remembered where to go..." Sonic remembers the joke, which wasn't funny at all. He probably lives in the dragon area...
114111211111111111211111111121111211.title: RAAAVE TIIIIIME... sorta...

choices: Skip out of the party, damn it's boring...
Sit there, see is you can make it through the night.
1141112111111111112111111111211112111.content:
You have the odd feeling something is wrong with Max. "I'd rather stay here... I don't feel like getting kicked around by the dragons again..." You say... suddenly something snaps in your mind */ My mind actually.../*. You spread your eyes. "Sonic, is Shadow near?" "Uh, yeah he's right over... there... uhm..." You turn around and see him at the pool table, losing a match. "He's probably angry..." You give your platter to Sonic. "Watch this for me..." You wink. You walk up to shadow. "So uh, how is it going?" He looks angry... doesn't he always? "I'm losing again for the third time in the goddamn row!" "I think you are going to lose a bit more... I saw some guards, they were looking for a hedgehog with black fur and red streaks... sound familiar..." He thinks for a second, of course he knew it would be him but why... "Oh yeah... I hit a guard in the nuts after he kicked me out of a bar..." 'As I expected' you think. "And WHY exactly were you kicked out?" "I was in the dragon part... some guy threatened me... I don't like being threatened..." He grins.

You take a few steps back... "Ooo.... keeej... I'll be over there..." You sit down at the bar again, and see Sonic struggle to keep the platter. "Off! Ya hungry wolves!" Tails looks up. "Did someone call me?" "You're a fox, smuck..." Knuckles says. Sonic hands you the platter. You eat the last part of apple and peaches and whatnot, plus the sausages, hotdogs actually. "So I'm not the only one who likes hotdogs anymore huh?" Sonic chuckles. You sigh.

"Tails! Did you fix that darn thing yet?" Some guy at the pool table yells, the green hedgehog you bumped into earlier, when you first came in, Sonic saying you're a lap dog, you taking it as a threat a- "I fixed it! Ok guys, I got tha music!" You shake your head. 'When something good happens, they are all happy... hmmf.' You think. You don't really remember being happy about anything, maybe satisfied but not really happy. suddenly the music bursts out next to you, you almost fall off the chair. "Not bad Miles, not bad..." Sonic says as he pats his buddy on the back. <Insert some random Dance music here>

The door storms open as a bat comes walking in. Rogue. She sits one seat away from you. Duh, Tails and Knuckles already surrounded you. She is sitting next to Knuckles. Tails starts to stare at you. You turn around and he continues working at the ghetto blaster. "What is it Tails?" You ask. "I always thought those two had something together, suddenly they sit next to each other... and... well you were staring at Rogue..." You laugh. "Nah, Tails, I ain't thinking about that..." Tails grins. "You wouldn't be the weirdest couple..." You raise your eyebrow. "Didn't you hear me?..." "Oh, I heard you perfectly but... uhm..." You turn around and see four eyes gazing at you. "Uh... what?" Knuckles laughs, Rogue only smiles and then looks away. You raise your eyebrow. "Did I say something weird?" You ask Sonic. "Nah, nevermind... we heard someone saying you were following her..." You think for a second, Sonic notices that. "Down the street? Up the walls?" "Oh really? Maybe I was just saw something fly and I wanted to make sure it wasn't going to attack me..." You think for a second, then you wave Sonic to lean closer. "I think she saved me..." You whisper. "What do you mean?" "I was in an alleyway with two guards, one looked like he wanted to fight... well he watched something, then turned around and left..." Sonic thinks for a second. Amazing how you can still talk to each other with this music on...

The party goes on all night, people dancing... Darknite and Violetta are already back. They look normal, they probably just talked. Sometimes I wonder what Sonic has in that mind of his. You sigh. "Boring... isn't it? Without a date..." Sonic says. Amy (You had learned her name), also at the bar, suddenly stands up. "So uh, Sonic... want to dance." Sonic shrugs. "You know, usually I'm a bit nervous but, just for once? Sure..." He gets up, leaving the bar counter behind him, steps on to an empty floor and starts to dance. "I can't remember ever seeing him dance, he's pretty good..." Tails says still sitting next to you. You wonder why no-one asked the hero to dance yet. You see Sonic and Amy matching to the tune, and each others dance. All you can hear is the cheesy music going pwap-pwaw-pwow-pwop with some drums on the background, over and over... Tails gets up right. "I got it!" He suddenly says. He pushes some buttons, connects a wire here and there and suddenly the music was mixed with another music, making it sound even better. Everyone cheered as the new music came out. You grin "Hip-hoppers..." Miles looks at you... something tells you he was thinking something as... Riiiiiight...
1141112111111111112111111111211112111.title: Ok, party, whatever...

11411121111111111121111111112111121111.content:
You get up. Sonic was right, it's boring without a girl. You walk out of the bar. Looking back. Tails watches you go out. So does Knuckles.

'They'll probably start to fight about the food...' You think as you open the door. Something tells you it's still pretty early, yet it's dark for a desert. You hear the door creaking behind you then stopping, and then a smack of it closing. As if you really paid attention to it. You feel like going to Max...
11411121111111111121111111112111121111.title: Leaving the place...

114111211111111111211111111121111211111.content:
You continue walking. There aren't many people out, probably because it's so damn dark. You keep walking until you reach a crossing. You don't remember coming across this. You look around. You figure that the dragon part is probably near the palace, as dragons live IN the palace. You head that way, to the left. Walking on and on. You suddenly hear a group talk right of you, behind a building. You stand with your back against the wall and look around the corner. You wonder why you do that but there doesn't seem to be any guards around. You see a guy with his hands chained and a group walking him to a place. They are going to the arena. It's Max! Of course it is, you might not be fighting against someone, but Max definitely is!

You walk up behind the group. One of the larger dragons turns his head. His yellow eyes widen. "Well well well, look who we have there." Max turns around his head to see you. He is gagged so he can't talk. "If it isn't our lil spoiler." Another one says. A smaller green one turns to laugh at you. "This is no place for you. If you wish to save your friend, too bad." You hear a form of clapping noise above you. You look up just to see the sky, turn darker every second. It looks like it's going to rain. Weird, you read about rain in the desert, plants will grow and then fall apart again. The group already turned around the corner. You pursue them. Not showing yourself. "I know you're following us you stupid hedgehog, there's no way you can save your friend." You aren't planning into getting yourself in trouble again. Suddenly you hear a low thud and something like a pot breaking open. "Dresco, are you ok?" The blue dragon, holding Max into place was hit by a falling jar.

Max takes a break for it as everyone is standing around the blue dragon. "Hey! STOP HIM!" You see the large dragon say. You run from behind the corner and after Max, running faster than he does. The guards were out at night time, enough room to shoot and ask questions later. Why didn't they put weights on the chain anyway? You think for some odd reason. Suddenly you see a guard take out something that looks like a laser pistol, aiming it at Max and shooting. You run up to him as fast as you can, diving into him, pushing him around the corner of a building while you roll away.
114111211111111111211111111121111211111.title: Max and the chase.

1141112111111111112111111111211112111111.content:
The laser comes searing past you as it burns right through the back of your upper right leg. You roll a time or 4 before you stop. You can smell the fur and meat burning. You can't move, you try to get up but you can't, because of the pain. Max knows that you are hit, but if he moves now, the guards will shoot him. You realize that, you know that it isn't his fault. You lay there, asking why you did this... Max could fight for himself...

As you look up you see a bat, Rogue to be more precise, trying to help you out. Too late, you hear something charging, a low humming noise. Then a buzz, Ptschoow!

...

All was red for a second, now all is black...

Your body lays there... you were shot in the head...

Wonder why they killed you? You ruined their fun...
1141112111111111112111111111211112111111.title: You are hit.

choices: Go to Max anyway. <Pushing you? Who? Me?>
1141112111111111112111111111211112111121.content:
*/ Just a short addition /*

You turn around, thinking how stupid your choice was.
You bump into Rogue, exactly behind you. "Oof!" You say as you almost fall. "Sorry, my bad." She says, "Are you ok?" She asks. You nod. "Were you following me?" You ask her pulling up your eyebrow, which you are starting to get good at...

"...I... I just thought uhm..." She tries to think up a lie. "I know you are going to lie. Why, did you follow me? That's all I ask." She shrugs. "I just wanted to know where you went... sorta like, protecting you I suppose..." You scratch your head. "So it WAS you..." You say. "The guards? Yes... that was me... I whistled that guy away." You nod. "Thanks for that, that guy was surely looking to beat my behind." She giggles... females usually giggle... "Your behind?" She asks staring at you. "Uh, yeah... sorry about my dialect, I seem to talk as if I'm from 50 years back! I didn't even know about flying cars... only about flying transport... uhm... planes... you know, the ones that can hover..."

She leans on her right leg. "Name's Rogue by the way." She says. "Nightstreak" You reply. "Hmm, interesting name." You shrug. "Aren't most hedgehogs named a bit weird. You got Sonic, as in fast, Darknite, Black fur and what not, Shadow, same thing. Same as for the fox, Tails, although his name is Miles..." She shrugs.

"You were going inside, right? It's pretty dark... and cold if you ask me." You look at her suit, wondering why it was made of rubber, latex whatever. You shake your head as you notice you stay stuck at the... part... if you know what I mean...
1141112111111111112111111111211112111121.title: Oof!

1141112111111111112111111111211112111122.content: ... Are you going to pick something yet?
1141112111111111112111111111211112111122.title: Other other...

choices: You sit next to mom and dad. (As if you want more dialogs)
You go looking for a date. (Insta click huh?)
11411121111111111121111111112111121112.content: You look around you, twirling on the bar chair. In your left eye corner you see a hedgehog and a female hedgehog... at least you hope... make out in the corner. You sigh. Tails is staring at them, you shove your elbow in his side. "Staring isn't polite." "Nor is pushing someone in the ribs..." You laugh. "Good one..." To the right you see dad and mom sit at the table, staring in each others eyes. You wonder if you should sit next to them... they are probably talking about what they missed. You don't want to interrupt them. Further to the right you see Knuckles and Rogue talk to each other. A bat and a Echidna, kinda weird. You shrug at your own thought. You are alone, no-one asked you to dance yet. You sit there, as no-one is keeping the bar. Tails doesn't seem to matter. "Tails..." You ask, he looks at you. "... do you have a girlfriend" You continue. "Well, there was a girl. She wasn't really my girlfriend, just a friend. Her name was Cream, she was pretty young, at least she looked really young but... rabits... you know what I mean right?" You smile. "Yeah I know what you mean... so... where is she?" You ask curious. "Well she uhm... she was too young..." You raise your eyebrow. "She couldn't have survived the trip... nor did her mom have any chances..." Your eyes widen. "Did they..." "... yes... they did..." "Oh my, god..." You say, whispering... You don't really believe in god anymore, since most of the time, you did things yourself. "I uhm... I am sorry man, I..." You want to say. "It's ok... those things happen... especially since that bastard of a... urgh..." Tails says and continues working at his ghettoblaster. You get up. "I'll leave you alone at your work." You say. You walk away. Just walking around when everyone is still dancing, Tails got different tunes on but still, something is missing for you to dance...
11411121111111111121111111112111121112.title: Lonely.

choices: Go to bed, you had enough.
114111211111111111211111111121111211121.content:
You walk up to the table where dad and mom are sitting. Mom leans over the table and hugs you, she hasn't looked at you since you came in and suddenly she starts to hug you and cry? "Thank you so much, you saved me, I missed you so much and..." Your mom rattles on, all you do is just hold her and your dad holds you, group hug. You smile. Maybe this is the first time you feel happy, everyone back, including your mom. "I missed you so much mom..." You start to cry. "I never... thought I would see you again..." You both say. Dad releases you.
You talk up till date on what all happened to you...

...and I am to lazy to write it all down, nor do I know what happened, nor do I know why I am actually writing this...

When you are finished trading stories there is a slow music on in the back ground, you see people romantically dancing. Your dad and mom are with them. You are alone again... You wonder where Max is.

Sonic sits next to you with Amy next to him, leaning with her hand on her knee, peering at you. "Night... I heard something awfull..." Sonic says. You stare in his eyes, he has a teer in his eye. "Max... Max was send to fight in the coloseum... 9 o clock, 2 hours ago..." Your jaw drops and your eyes widen. "He didn't survive it..." Amy doesn't appear to cry, heck, she didn't even know the guy. For some odd reason, you expected her too. You let your head fall on to the table. You close your eyes, thinking how stupid you were, you should've gone to Max, you knew you should have.

"Who... who killed him..." You ask. "His opponent, the wolf." He says slowly. "I don't remember his name, he'll probably celebrate his victory tomorrow." You burst into tears, this time not from joy. "I know this is all hard, since you're only 15 and all... boy do you seem stronger and faster than 15... uh, if you need help or anything , just call me." Knuckles also seemed to drop a tear, Tails did too, probably thinking about Cream. Sonic stood up and walked away. Amy just sat there watching you.

"What do you want..." You snarl. "Easy there... I was just looking at you... you knew him pretty well... don't you." You think for a second. Actually you only knew him one day. "You could say that." You reply. "Why aren't you crying, may I ask." "I didn't know him... sorry..." She says as she gets up. You dry off your eyes and your fur with a napkin.
114111211111111111211111111121111211121.title: Meeting. The death of a friend.

choices: Your mom, she probably decided to lay next to you
1141112111111111112111111111211112111211.content:
You walk up to Sonic. "Do you mind if I sleep upstairs? I don't really have a house yet..." He smiles. With still a tear */I spelled it wrong -_-/* in his eye. "Your not old enough to have one... sure go ahead there are more rooms there." You did notice some more doors when you got a bath.

You go to the back of the bar, just to see someone stand there, totally black. Shadow seems to be thinking. Probably about Max. He turns his head and looks at you. Then he nods. As if he knows what you were thinking. You walk up the stairs. Someone sat on the couch. Everything was cleaned since last time. You walk further down a hall way, opening one door you see a bed, to the right is a toilet, further down the hall there is another bed. You wonder how they made the outside dried clay and the inside carpet with clay walls. You more wonder why downstairs some things are made of wood, and how in the world clay can hold things as heavy. Maybe it's special clay. As you think on you trip over something and land right into your bed. You turn around, take out your boots and lay in the bed. The cover is nice and smooth, something silky. Maybe it IS silk. At this point you wonder why you suddenly think about stuff so much... maybe it's because you lost people, found them, lost some again and maybe because you got thrown in a place. This is probably going to cause traumas...

You lay on your side, then on you roll on your stomach and fall asleep.

...

You wake up. Someone is laying next to you. It seems day through the window as the curtains are lit a bit.

You roll to your other side just to see...
1141112111111111112111111111211112111211.title: Good night, good morning <Odd titles huh?>

choices: You wake up Tails.  Someone comes down
Dad and mum come down first, then Rogue and the rest.
1141112111111111112111111111211112111211.content:
You scare and want to roll away, only thing you is fall on the floor. She wakes up. "Urgh... mornin." She says simply. "What the... why were you in my bed?" You say rubbing your head. "Just, sleeping, relax. I usually sleep here, you slept in my bed..." You sigh of relief. "Phew... I almost thought you saw me for someone else!" You grin. "Joking I hope?" She says as she gets up. You look away to see that she isn't... fully dressed... you blush. "Oh come on, it isn't that bad is it?" She jokes as she walks into the closet searching for clothes.

You simply hop into your shoes. "I wonder why you hedgehogs almost never dress." She says as she is finished. She has the same suit on again. "I wonder why you have the same suit on every day." She smiles. "It's just that it makes me harder to get spotted while I fly above the town. "As hard as to get spotted as when I was looking at you on the roof?" She looks at you, then tilts her head. "The time that I shoo-ed the guards away?" She smiles. "I only keep an eye out for those who need help..." You smile. "Is that, those who need help with protecting, or those who need help getting their bags lightened." You say. She looks a bit uncomfortable. "Ok so maybe I thief sometimes... but no petty thieving, that's for sure..." You laugh.

You walk out the door, suddenly your mood drops to the floor as you realize what happened today. The loser always get fed to the animals in the desert, as a ritual. You don't want to go to watch... it sorta was your fault. You go into the toilet to wash your face, not in the toilet, the sink of course.

You take a leak and then, after washing your hands you get out. Just to see the door to your right open. Your dad and mom come out. In the left hall you see Sonic and Amy in Sonic's bed... Tails, Knuckles and Shadow probably have their own place, you remember Tails having his own garage, or something close to that. Maybe he has a repair shop... you shake your head, snapping out of your damn thoughts for the billionth time. You greet mom and dad as they pass and you halt Rogue. "I noticed you have a... feeling... for Knuckles, why not ask if you can sleep at his place?" You ask, trying not to be rude.

"He was drunk from yesterday's message... he seems to be drunk allot these times... must be hard for him, getting kicked off his royal place..." Rogue walks to the bathroom. Just to wash her face, do some make-up where needed, mostly her eyes, the rest is perfect... you slap your own face thinking of that.

Sonic and Amy are still sleeping. You walk down the stairs, just to see an empty bar. You don't remember it being so quiet. You see Tails sleeping on the couch, next to the table, with his shoes and 'gloves' on. What was it with hedgehogs and others and gloves again? You don't remember ever wearing gloves, unless it was cold outside... of course. You snap out of your damn philosophic thinking for the zillionth time!

*/ I know I'm making him think, but I don't care... as those are probably the things I wonder.../*

You wait and see who comes down the stairs first.
1141112111111111112111111111211112111211.title: Mornin!

choices: You ask Tails if you can help him with any experiments
You ask Sonic if you can help him with the bar.
1141112111111111112111111111211112111211.content:
You walk up to the couch and bend over the wooden arm. You shake Tails' pillow. "Wakey wakey Miles!" You say. Tails groans and sits up right. "Is it morning already?" He says. "Where is the boom-box?" You ask. "The stereo? I lent it to Knuckles. I don't want it to be stolen." "Wasn't Knuckles drunk last night?" Tails shakes his head. "He wasn't drunk if you ask me... only a bit sad about what happened to Max..." You think for a second. If Knuckles wasn't drunk... "Then why was Rogue sleeping next to me..." You think out loud... "What? Sorry, Rogue sleeping next to you? She only was there because she... well lets just say, she was too tired to walk all the way..." Tails says thinking for some seconds. "You mean she just wanted to... that's why she flew above me constantly..." Tails stares at you. "You have to be kidding me right..." Tails gets up and walks to the bar when suddenly Rogue comes down. You smile and look confused at the same time. "That was fast..." you say looking at her. "She looks at you with a question mark on her face. "Fast at what?" She asks.

You shake your head. "Sorry I was just a bit confused, I thought you took a bath..." "... Why would I take a bath, I ain't that dirty... besides, it ain't Sunday yet... right?" You have no idea what the current date is... for a second you think. Who did I forget... who did I forget... who... "DAMNIT!" You suddenly yell. Everyone looks at you, even your mom and dad, coming down the stairs. You hear some movement upstairs, probably Sonic that woke up. "What happened to the human?!" You ask, thinking of the man you had saved. Tails looks down, thinking. "I believe we let the hospital take care of him, they are probably looking after him, it's safer than with the guards, I ensure you..." He says. Sonic comes down the stairs. "Mornin everyone... Amy's still upstairs... doing what she has to do."

For some reason, no-one seems to have walls under his or her eyes. No-one is stressed or tired... not even your mom, probably because the desert sun is so damned hot. Good thing it was nice and cool yesterday evening, or you would've died in bed!

You, Rogue, Tails, mom and dad and eventually Amy all sit around the bar. Sonic is in the 'kitchen' again. Now that there isn't much noise you can hear a fridge open and close. Something being poured into glasses, then something else was poured and eventually you hear some rustling. Then Sonic comes out with all sorts of stuff. You are still wondering how he got it. Some of Tail's favorite on a plate, some of Rogue's favorite, fruit you notice. Figures... bats... there you almost go again. Some more fruits for Amy. Some... sandwiches for Tails, dad and mums favorite, and apparently the same as yours, fruit, fruit and some more fruit. There's more fruit than there is meat. There is a Giant loaf on the middle of the bar. Some jam and some other pots filled with weird labeled goods. Coffee for the grown ups and lemonade for you and Tails, you feel like you are being seen as a 6 year old. Furthermore Amy and Rogue get fruit juice.

You really have the feeling as if you were sleeping under a rock for some time as you see the labels on the pots. "Are you going to eat or just stare?" Sonic suddenly says. "Huh what? Oh sorry... I just, sorta started thinking again..." Sonic nods and leans back on his chair behind the counter, with his own sandwich he made. "Thanks anyway for making this..." You say. The rest thanks Sonic too. While they are eating. "I do this daily so uh, don't thank me, thank the supplies being dropped here..." He says. You eat whatever is on your plate. Finishing as last.

The bar only opens at 10. You wonder why it was called Hedgehog hall, if it was just a bar, not really a hall... it was a big bar though but...
"You should stop thinking all the time." A light voice appears behind you. You turn around to see Amy. "Hi Amy... sorry about the way I acted yesterday..." She smiles, then looks serious. "You do say sorry allot, don't you... you changed so much since the first time you got here." You frown. "What do you mean with that?" You actually didn't really notice it before, but she was right. "Just the way you act..." She walks away, not finishing her lines again.

"Hey Night..." Finally someone calling your name for a change... "check this out!" Sonic held a guitar. You stare in awe as Sonic gives it to you. "Give it a try." You take it. "I don't know, I never really tried anything before..." You say. "It's only going to be for amusement, you must be bored..." He says. Indeed, you were a tad bored. You sit on a normal chair. You pull a string as you turn a button. Doing it to all until you have a perfect match, actually you don't even know what you are doing. You strike 3 snares after each other. It having 5. That didn't sound bad, more like one of those strikes you hear in the beginning of a tune.

You hold a part and then pull another string. A long sharp tune comes out. Reminding you of a song, you try to reenact. Higher and lower and higher, keep it there, pull two strings and... that didn't sound bad at all, maybe good as a start... you strike all the strings in the end. Tails, sitting in front of you, which you hadn't noticed, smiles. "Not bad, did you practice?" He asks. "No, actually this is my first time I ever played... weird isn't it... <Damnit do I wish I could post a link!>.

Tails shrugs. You continue to practice as Sonic comes out with a smaller guitar, a bass-guitar to be precise... a red one... you and your damn, to be precise, constantly... You definitely notice you changed...

Sonic starts to play a tune. <And I still wish I could post a link.> Soon after that you both try to match to each other's play. Soon Tails and mom 'n dad had joined around the table as you played. To bad there wasn't an amplifier. It sounded low enough on it's own though. Tails sprints out the door. "Where's he going to?" You ask while you play. "He's probably got an idea again." You start wondering off again, slowing your pace as you think. Why were all things happening at the same time, you learn how to play things, you become a hero, your friend dies, it's all becoming to much... Sonic sees something is wrong. He stops playing and lays his guitar against table's leg.
"Are you ok... Night?" "Son?" "Streak?" "Night?" All of them were asking if you were ok. You knew something was wrong.

Dad stands up. "I know what's wrong... everything changes so fast... friends come and go, he gets thrown in here and is lonely, I saw his face when he heard about his friend's death, and when he was looking at a couple. He doesn't have a girlfriend to stick around with and..." You hear Rogue cough, and Sonic get's up. "Not to interfere, I might be his uncle but I'm also his friend, so is Tails." Sonic says. "I... sorta am his friend too" Rogue says. You look at her, so do Amy and Sonic. "What?" Rogue asks. "It's not like we have anything close..." Amy shakes her head and continues doing... nothing important... "I think he needs something to do..." Mom says. "He can work at the bar if he wants to, maybe help Tails with some experiments..." You like the sound of the last part... You get off the chair with the guitar hanging around your neck. "Please, guys, this isn't necessary, maybe I'm just a bit stressed, about the sudden happenings... but there's no need to worry. Some days here and I'll be fine..." You hear that echo in your mind. You know it won't be fine... as long as your in this dump of a city...

Tails comes back in with a keyboard/piano. Everyone stares at him. "Did I miss something?"
1141112111111111112111111111211112111211.title: Morning breakfast.

1141112111111111112111111111211112111211.content:
You spin around to face Sonic. "So uh... uncle... Sonic... can I work in the bar?" You ask. "I knew you would help me!" He says. "I really need some help around here. To look after the bar when I'm gone and maybe to clean up, so I don't have to do all stuff alone, I warn you it's back breaking work if you have to do it all day..." You smile. "It's ok... one question..." "... About the payment offer?" He asks, he already knew what you were going to say. You nod. "How about... 5 gold pieces a hour?" You tilt your head. "5? Is that much around here?" You ask. "Well, yeah, I mean, I remember being a glass of beer costing 1 gold piece. And back in the time that was something around 3 dollars..." You nod. "Wow, thanks Sonic! Man I really have the feeling I have been sleeping under a damn rock..." You say, repeating your own thought. He waves his hand and then walks back into the kitchen, probably preparing for the opening.

For the first time you see a clock hanging somewhere in the corner. Hard to spot from behind the bar as there is a giant lamp hanging in front of it. Clever...
You get up and walk to Rogue sitting at the other side of the room, with Amy. Rogue gets up and walks upstairs... hopefully she didn't think you were following her. Amy did notice you though. She doesn't say anything, she knows you are just going to ask about what just happened.

1141112111111111112111111111211112111211.content:
The fox looks at Tails, he stares back with his jaw down. She giggles. You shut Tails' mouth. "He's just uhm..." You say. "Weird..." Rogue continues. Tails shakes his head quick. "No I'm not..." Tails says.

"He's cute!" The blinding pink fox says. "Uhuh..." You say trying to look sarcastic.
"So uh... are you the only fox around here?" The fox asks. "I... I am..." Tails says. He's shy as hell, he'd almost melt if she got closer. "Well, that's not totally true, there are some other foxes... but they are mostly thieves and are hiding..." Rogue says. "Nor are they from the same 'type' as you two..." "Ah, I get it... anyway, my name is Tanja... Nice to m-" A large crackle came from outside, with a annoying beep tone. Then a big voice booms over the intercom.

"Today we have two new members to our community, Tanja Redfield, a female fox, and Litespeed..." The microphone goes off for a second. "That's correct, Litespeed, a female echidna. They are expected to arrive at the dome arena in 4 minutes. Send them." Another crackle and complete silence. "Is this it?" Tanja asks. Rogue nods. "We'll be watching you from the tribune..." You all group and walk out the door.

Tails walks up next to Tanja. "I'll be watching you..." Tails says. "So what exactly do I have to do?!" She asks. "First you have to collect some things in a time trial, you have 10 minutes for 20 objects. They are scattered over an underground arena with small obstacles. Above the ground you will have to fight someone, selected by the audience." Sonic says, catching his breath for a second. Tanja and Litespeed... awkward name for a echidna, more something for a hedgehog, are both startled. "Let's just keep moving..."

Some streets further you reach a large dome, a other arena than where you fought in. Weird you didn't see it when you were on the roof of the building. "We are here... you two go in that way, get the best weapon you can get, my bet is a sabre or something with a red tip, don't touch that tip..." They both walk off, still startled, into an entryway.

(10 minutes later)

"... The contestants successfully managed to get the objects..."

You are in a large arena, best described as a Colosseum, as it's from stone with some statues in the walls. There is a large stone pillar in the mid, surrounded by 4 walls, 2 with gaps. There are metal like pillars in the outside of the arena, behind those are larger walls, and up those walls is the tribune, where you are sitting. Two walkways, entries, are on both sides. On two sides of the circle are large tribunes. Draco and a group is sitting on one of them. The other one is empty.

1141112111111111112111111111211112111211.content:
You turn around to see Tails is missing. It isn't all to crowded, most of the people are on the other side, dragons... it almost looks like the tribunes are divided in two. You get up. You are sitting right next to the stairs so you would've noticed Tails getting past you.

You walk down the stairs just to see Tails hanging over the railing. "Now! The fight will start, contestants, good luck." Draco says over yet another intercom.

You run over to the railing, almost falling over it. Tails' eyes are fixated on Tanja. She carries a sword, a small sword with a curve, something close to a katana. Litespeed had a trident, or a pitchfork or at least a smaller version of one. The 'wolves' are dressed in small leather shirts. Body armor, not really thick but thick enough to hold a knife. Both of them have a spear.

"Are those guys twins?" Tails asks focusing his eyes on the wolves. "They look like it don't they?" You say as the wolves seem to be exactly the same.
Tanja walks around the pillar, jumps over some wrecks and turns her sword behind her back. Waving her hand to the wolf, taunting him. You can't see Litespeed, she's behind the pillar. You do see the dragon audience raising there fists and yelling.

You fix on Tanja as she easily dodges some swings from the spear. You wonder what she is thinking right now. As the wolf thrusts the spear toward her, she simply dodges and slices away with her katana. Cutting him in the leg. He leans on his other leg for a second. The cheers of the audience are to loud behind you.

"Look! Up there!" Tails says, pointing to the large pillar in the middle. A red echidna is standing there. "How did she get up there?!" You say, staring in awe. "I suppose that's why she's called Litespeed... I mean, she ran up there from the side! I saw it!" Tails says, also staring in awe, but with his jaw hanging again.

You hear a scream from down you. Tanja has a cut on her arm, the wolf's spear sliced a bit in front of her, hitting her arm. You can somewhat see her eyes starting to glow red. Not literally, but she got up and almost chipped off the wolf's leg! You can see the blood pouring over his white fur. He's laying with one knee up looking up. As Tanja holds him down with her katana. "We want to see blood, but not ours! We want to see blood, but not ours!" Everyone yells in the audience. You laugh at the thought of that line. "What are you laughing about, he's going to die..." Tails says staring. Tanja sticks her sword in the sand, kicking the wolf's spear away, helping him up. You can see her mouth move, and the wolf's.

Litespeed was still on the pillar, now sitting on the edge. You could see a group of 'medics' attending the corpse of the other wolf. Suddenly the name Litespeed strikes you. You heard that name before, but can't remember it. "Are you ok?" Tails asks, looking at your 'pale' face. "I... I'm fine..." You manage to say.

"In a honorable defeat, Tanja and Litespeed are the duo. Vector's life was spared by Tanja Redfield. Good show... that was all. You may now leave the arena."

1141112111111111112111111111211112111211.content:
They are both males. One walks in. He's a black anthro tiger, he wears no shirt, his muscular build visible, but he is by no means a meathead. He has red stripes lining his body, with red eyes. His hair is fire-like in style, being different shades of red and orange. His claws are blood red. He wears Asian style pants that are red with a darker shade of red belt. He walks in.
"Greetings, I'm Kansama..." he said walking in, his long tail following behind him.
Another fur, a wolf of some sort, walked in. His fur was a dark gray. He had three gold face paint marks on him, one on each cheek, with one coming up from his chin to right below his mouth. He wore a cape and wore gloves that covered his whole lower arm, with the tips of his fingers sticking out. He didn't smile that much, his amber eyes deprived of happiness.
"Greetings, I'm Kai." He said walking in.
After a bit of a discussion as Kai and Kansama both indulged in an alcoholic beverage, they chuckled when they were informed they would have to fight.
"Bring it, I love live prey..." Kansama grinned evilly, barring his sharp claws and licking his lips.
"Nothing to fear, nobility shall win the round.." Kai said.
"Attention citizens! Report to the Colloseum for a match! New members Kai Lupek and Kansama will be fighting for their lives and their right to be here in the arena!" Draco's voice said over the intercom.
"Mind escorting us?" Kai and Kansama said. You didn't notice they were talking to you.
"M-me?" you say pointing at yourself. The two nodded. "Okay..."
You walked outside together into the dusty city streets.

1141112111111111112111111111211112111211.content:
As you walk down some streets left and right here and there you come across a smaller way, it's almost as narrow as an alley way. "This way!" You say pointing to lead. The wolf, Kai, stopped. "I have a bad feeling about this." He says. You turn around. Kansama walks on. "Come on, it's not that scary, just an alleyway..." He says. Still readying his claws. You look surprised, as if you didn't know that 'cats' had claws. You run up behind the tiger. "Let's go Kai" You say. As he slowly sneaks up behind you looking around nervously.

Suddenly you hear a long battle cry and suddenly you smack to the ground. You roll over to see what you got hit by. You see a large bear like creature struggling with Kansama. You quickly get up and brace yourself. "HEY!" You hear a deep voice say behind you. You look around and put your hands up just in time to hold a club from hitting your hand. You pull the club and swing the thin side to the head of... a small dragon... reminding you of max. But not the same scale color. You flip the bat around and swing again with the larger side, hitting him against the head again, making him tumble back and fall down unconcious. "Nggh, GRAAA!" You hear and you're on the floor again. "Sorry about that..." You hear Kansama whisper. He is laying next to you. He coughs. The bear threw him against you. "Stay laying for a while..." You say as you get up. First you need to kneel. You look forward to see a big-ass bear with a amphora in his hands standing in front of you. You throw your bat at the amphora so the lower half breaks off. Good thinking, though you lost your bat...
1141112111111111112111111111211112111211.title: Trouble is near.

1141112111111111112111111111211112111211.content:
You look a bit further to see Kai laying on the ground, bleeding. "KAI!" You yell as you feel the anger build inside you. The bear throws the half of the amphora at you. You feel a burst of energy and swing your fist at the amphora. For some odd reason it bursts in shrapnell, really small pieces as sharp as glass. You hear cut noises as they penetrate the clay walls. One is stuck in your hand. You slowly pull it out, screaming of pain. The bear is stunned at the act you just delivered. You throw the sharp piece up and catch it on the tip, throwing it at the bear. Hitting him directly in the eye. He screams as he falls on his knees, his hands over the piece in his eye. */ I watch too much movies... -_- /*

You pull some shrapnell pieces out of the walls and throw them spinning at the bear. One hits his wrists, making it spread blood and another one flies past his ear, scratching it deep. Some other pieces miss, you shouldn't have thrown them spread style. He cries some more as the blood covers up his fur... Kansama walks up behind you, rubbing some sharves off his fur.

"Did you just do that?" He says as he looks at the agonizing sight. The 'Red glow' in your eyes wears off. You are stunned because of what you just did, you wonder how. You look down at the boots you got from Knuckles. He said they were special... but did they cause that? "KAI!" You suddenly hear Kansama yell as he runs up to the downed Wolf. He's bleeding from his mouth, looking in directions. He wasn't fit for battling the large bear. Atleast not without a weapon. He tries to talk but he can't. You can see his chest raise and lower on the rithm of his breathing. "God, Kai, come on. Stay with me..." Kansama says. "This isn't going to work!" He says hanging Kai over his shoulder. "What about the arena? Draco's men will hunt you down!" You say facing him. "Screw that, I'll take them on, one on one!" "YOU HEAR ME? ONE ON ONE!" He yells in to an unexisting space. You walk up to the direction of the bar. Passing everyone that was going to the arena. "Gosh, what happened." "What the..." "Is he ok?" "What happened?!" You hear from all sides while you pass the civilians on the way to the hedgehog hall.

Kansama burst in the door. Sonic and Tails are still behind the bar, just locking up. Kansama throws some stuff off the bar and lays Kai on.

1141112111111111112111111111211112111211.content:
"Wo wo wo. Weren't you supposed to go to the fight?" Sonic says putting on his shades. "No time! Help him!" Kansama yells. Tails looks for a few seconds. "What happened to him?" Sonic asks. "Some guys just came outta nowhere and beat us down for no apparent reason, a bear and a dragon type." You say.

"Hmm... fracture at the chest, maybe internal wounds... I don't know if the blood is coming from the lungs." Tails says. You scratch your head wondering how he sees that. Sonic crouches and comes back up with a first aid kit in his hand. You help Kansama tie the shreds on his arms while Tails tells what to do. 'This kid should be a doctor.' You think.
"Shouldn't we get him to a hospital? He might have internal wounds and I don't want anyone to bleed to death in the bar!" Sonic says. It sounded as if he said he didn't want blood in the bar, as if he didn't care.

(4 minutes later)

Apparently nothing bad happened, he wasn't bleeding internally for some odd reason, and the blood on his mouth was because of his tongue that got shredded. Nothing to severe but still hell of a scare.
Kai is resting on the bench, Kansama is sitting next to him. "How d'ya know all this, Tails?" You hear Sonic ask. You look around and see Tails 'blush'. "Well... one day I was sitting behind my computer and... I searched for machine parts... and I got to this biological site on wikipedium..."

*/ different story XD/*

Wikipedium... computers... you don't remember having that much technology, even in a period of robots and stuff...

You feel a hand on your shoulder. "Hey..." You hear the voice of Rogue say. "What are you doing here? Shouldn't you be waiting in the arena?" You ask. "Everyone is waiting... impatiently... at the arena. I told Draco that I was going to get the new fighters. That's why there aren't any guards in here yet." You nod and smile. "Thanks... I don't know if Kai is able to fight..." "I... I don't think that... lets just say that, if he wasn't able to withstand... whatever it was that happened... no way he was going to win the fight... I don't think he'll be accepted..." Your eyes widen. "What do you mean? It was a bastard strike, just when we didn't expect it!" You snarl. "Easy, easy. I'm just saying..." Apparently Rogue has a soft spot... a thief with a soft spot... "Uh... Nightstreak... you think too much... and you have... sorta like mood swings..." You think about that. She was right. It all started when you got shoved off in mid air. Your mind started to think differently...

You fly up to the nearby roof top where you fall down, suspending yourself in the air, you land on your feet. "Nice flip!" You hear a woman's voice say. You look up to see who the bat was. The female bat... what was her name again...

"Do you know him?" She asks. "Not really, we just, sorta met each other..." You say, remembering the moment in the bar. "How do you know my name? And what's yours." You think for a second. "I have no idea how I know your name... my name is Nightstreak."

So, should I bring you some place?

11521.content:
"I am a dragon." You say. You have red scales, a yellow underbelly, are slightly muscular, yellow eyes, and are generally nice unless pissed off. You remembered how you ate an annoying head of the football team at your school, Bill, as well as all his minions. You began to deal with each person who threatened you by eating them. You weren't a bully, but nobody had the guts to fight you in school anymore. You came here to find your 18-year old brother, Xaru(pronounced Zar-oo) It turned out he dealt with bullies that way too. When you were captured, you were asked for any last rquests. You said to be exiled to this desert. They laughed, unaware that you wanted to come here to see your brother.
"What is your name?" Draco asked.
"Karu." you say.
"Age?" Draco said.
"Sixteen."
"Any relatives?"
"My parents were sent to another camp and my brother was sent here. His name is Xaru."
"Did you say Xaru?" Draco said with shock.
"Yes. Why?"
"Xaru is the name of one of the most powerful dragons here. Consider your debt repaid." Draco said tossing you a very shiny gold and silver amulet. He also tossed a gold coin. "Pay the rat on the wheel in the elevator and he'll take you down. Tell your brother I said hi. Also, if you wish to find others of your kind, go to a place called the Draconic Den."
You proceeded to the rickety-looking elevator, payed the rat, and it began to spin a wheel it was on, sending the elevator down. Soon, you arrived at the bottom. You looked into a hall that had a large door at the end. You could also go left and right into other halls. You headed outside of this palace. You saw a huge contrast in the area outside. The streets had pebbles scattered across them as pavement. The buildings were only up to three floors high. You looked up and saw the palace was a few hundred feet up, with a large lighthouse like structure on top about 40 feet high. The buildings also looked like they were made from clay and sticks put together.
